title: Remnants of War
text:
Remnants of War is the second album by <a href="Helstar">Helstar</a> released by <a href="Combat%20Records">Combat</a> in 1986. It was recorded following a lineup change and a change of studio to Mad Dog Studios in California. The sound of the album was a gradual progression from the traditional <a href="heavy%20metal%20music">heavy metal</a> style of the band's debut album, "<a href="Burning%20Star%20%28album%29">Burning Star</a>" towards the <a href="power%20metal">power</a>-<a href="thrash%20metal">thrash</a> sound that the band forged throughout the 1980s. It was the last album released on <a href="Combat%20Records">Combat Records</a>.
Track listing.
All tracks written by Helstar.
